chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Yes
great! i'm at the starting point
there's a twig to my left leading to a small island with a tiger on it. which way should i go?
down to the island with the butterfly
got it! now i'm on the butterfly island
where to next?
across to frog island
alrighty! made it to frog island, now what?
cross the rocks to parrot island
okay, now i'm with the parrot
next move?
go to giraffe island
phew! chilling with the giraffe now
where to now?
cross past the snake to the treasure box
awesome! i'm by the treasure now *finished*
hi there! que comience el juego!!
yes
cool! start by moving a bit left, passing beneath a bench
cross the trail towards the florist stand. before reaching it, sharp left, buddy! cross the trail again and head towards the white dog
there
well done! now scoot over the branch and keep heading south
look for a white dog near a picnic blanket, you're spot on!
im at the white dog
perfect! now, glide over the picnic mat, graze a bowl of berries and keep going west
keep the adventure alive!
ok
nice! now, see that wooden branch? use it to cross the river to the north
k
you're doing great! now, don't touch that bush! circle it right and head off to the florist stand
ok
perfect! sneak left, slide below the stand until you spot a big bridge with cyclists
pass by west of the bridge
ok
great! just after the bridge, you'll notice two elderly folk on a bench immersed in today's news
hey, estas listo?
yes
i'm at the tent up north
there's a dog to the south. where to next, amigo?
go south past the dog until you hit the trail
alright, past the dog now
i see a fire with a red mushroom to the right, and a blue car down south. which way to go?
go up and around the fire until you see the blue car
got it, now i'm by the blue car
go left on the trail then down when it splits until you reach a telescope
there's the telescope you mentioned, blue and shiny! can see some rocks and a house on the west
that the right direction?
cross between the telescope and bush to the path then head to the log cabin
walking towards the cabin now, surrounded by rocks
looks pretty cool from here. *finished*
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yes
super! move under the first tree, swing right past the second palm and dodge to your left before the third tree
keep going southward buddy!
ok
seeing a brown puppy? make a slight left then head right, continuing south
you're doing great!
k
nice! now, find a big rock and a small one
there is a path between them leading to the water. head there!
k
splash, into the water you go
got a red crab in sight? take a right, and follow along the big rock, keep going west, mate!
k
find a medium rock on your way
got a shark staring at ya? make a swift right!
ok
you're doing awesome! now, head back to land
squeeze between the medium rock and a colorful ball and head north
k
slight left turn now mate, and head northwest
ok
see a red tent and a larger speaker? pass between them, you got this!
yes
heck yeah! now circle around the tent, like you're having a fun run!
ok
head south towards the sea, man! but don't jump in just yet! turn right at the shore and walk below a red kayak
ok
make a quick 90 degrees turn to your right (north) and follow along the kayak
you're almost there!
ok
and boom! you've reached a small green bush
congrats, mate! you've made it!
yes
that was some epic navigating, buddy! you're a true explorer
can't wait for our next map adventure!
k
cool! catch you later, buddy!
bye
bye! take care!
